metrics.name: lines-of-code
metrics.description: total lines of typescript/tsx code in src/ directory
metrics.command: find src/ -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' -not -path '*/node_modules/*' | xargs wc -l | tail -1 | awk '{print $1}' || echo '0'

metrics.name: lines-of-test-code
metrics.description: Total lines of TypeScript/TSX code in tests/ directory
metrics.command: find tests/ -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' -not -path '*/node_modules/*' | xargs wc -l | tail -1 | awk '{print $1}' || echo '0'

metrics.name: test-coverage
metrics.description: Test coverage percentage for the codebase
metrics.command: bun test --coverage --coverage-reporter=lcov >/dev/null 2>&1 && awk -F'[: ,]' '/^DA:/ { total_lines++; if ($3 > 0) hit_lines++ } END { if (total_lines > 0) printf "%.2f", (hit_lines / total_lines) * 100; else print "0" }' coverage/lcov.info

metrics.name: total-bundle-size
metrics.description: Total size of all compiled GitHub Actions
